snippet.name: Check and fix duplicates
snippet.starttext: <cfset dupKey = hash(friendGeo.latitude & "," & friendGeo.longitude) /> <cfif structKeyExists(coords,dupKey)> <cfset friendLocation.latitude = listFirst(coords[dupKey]) + 0.01 /> <cfset friendLocation.longitude = listLast(coords[dupKey]) + 0.01 /> <cfelse> <cfset friendLocation.longitude=geoCode.longitude /> <cfset friendLocation.latitude=geoCode.latitude /> </cfif> <cfset coords[dupKey] = friendLocation.latitude & "," & friendLocation.longitude />
